title: Handle Earnest Money Release
description: A transaction has been cancelled. The agent must facilitate the release of the earnest money deposit based on the cancellation agreement.

tasks.description: Receive the fully signed cancellation agreement, noting which party is to receive the earnest money.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the buyer is entitled to the refund.

tasks.description: Draft the earnest money release instructions for the escrow holder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the formal release instructions.

tasks.description: Send the release instructions to both the buyer and seller for signature, then forward to escrow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates the signing and delivery of the release instructions.
